thought the first ones up, let'sjust get up and go fishing this
morning.So we cleared everything off the

and acted like she was going toget ready to go fishing.

You're going to take this?>> KEITH: Yeah.
Jerri and the others, theywanted to take the canoe out.

we've got all our gear, we'regetting ready to go."
"Oh, we were going to do that."Well, isn't that ironic, you
know, just 'cause we were goingto go?
>> TINA: Well, that's why wewere going to go, because you

way.">> KEITH: At Tribal Council last

And then, of course, she wantedto make sure that everybody was
clear that she was here to winthe money.
And she's going to do whatevershe has to to win the money.
So, Tina and I were a littlemiffed by that.
>> TINA: You have four or fiveyoung people playing.
You know, they've got so muchchemistry that it is almost
second nature just to-- whoo--just immediately gravitate

>> JERRI: It's all I can do tokeep from just laughing out
